name: LD41: RCZ - Defender
description:
It is a simple game. You need to shoot the fruit thieves and save your fruits. This is my first Ludam Dare game. The theme was different than what I thought and so making a game on that was a bit difficult for me and so I made a game mixed with Shooting and Tower Defense games. I hope you all would like it and enjoy it.

Support it on - Patreon - RCZ
